message.original: 敵を追従する猛ダッシュの斬りつけ攻撃を放つ 初撃が当たると連続で斬り返しを放つ <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇 LV.６で移動距離が延長／ 斬り返し回数増加（１→３）</COL>
message.translation: Dashes past the target with blades extended, delivering slashes that can be followed with further attacks on contact. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Increases moving distance. Increases number of further attacks (1→3).</COL>

message.original: 一歩踏み込み、敵を上空へ斬り上げる ボタンの追加入力で追撃する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇 LV.６で攻撃ヒット数増加</COL>
message.translation: Steps in with a blade strike that sends the target aloft. Additional button presses throw and detonate a store of powder. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Increases number of hits.</COL>

message.original: 瞬時に身を引き、すぐさま前方に蹴りを放つ 敵の攻撃を回避しつつ繰り出せば威力が上昇する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇 LV.６でモーション変化／攻撃ヒット数増加</COL>
message.translation: Pulls back momentarily afore unleashing a frontal kick. Using it as an evasive maneuver increases its power. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Motion changes. Increases number of hits.</COL>

message.original: シーカーロープを投げて敵を捉え、 手前に引き寄せる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に引き寄せる力の上昇 LV.６で攻撃範囲拡張/捕捉敵数増加（１→３）</COL>
message.translation: Casts out your seeker rope to snare lightweight foes, pulling them to the ground to incapacitate them. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases the force of the pull. LV.6: Increase range of the effect. Increases total enemies affected (1→3).</COL>

message.original: 空中からシーカーロープを放って地面にひっかけ、 地上に向かって急降下攻撃を繰り出す 高所から行うことで威力が上昇。空中でも発動可能 <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇 LV.６で周囲の敵をのけぞらせることが可能</COL>
message.translation: Hook the ground with your seeker rope, performing a dive attack towards the ground. A high altitude will increase the power. Can be activated in the air. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Inflicts stagger on surrounding enemies.</COL>

message.original: 前方に飛び蹴りを繰り出し、敵を踏み台にして 上空へ跳び上がる 空中でも発動可能 <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にジャンプ力上昇 LV.６で敵のガード状態を崩すことが可能</COL>
message.translation: Leaps forward in a flying kick, then uses the target as a foothold to jump still higher. Can be activated in the air. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases force of the jump. LV.6: Breaks enemy guard.</COL>

message.original: 自身を通常の構え姿勢に戻し、様々な動作の スキを消すことができる（連続では行えない） 空中でも発動可能 <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に再発禁止時間が短縮 LV.６でのけぞり、吹き飛び中でも発動可能</COL>
message.translation: Returns the user to a neutral stance, eliminating openings caused by other actions. Cannot be performed continously. Can be activated in the air. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Reduces the restriction time between uses. LV.6: Can be used even during stagger/knockback.</COL>

message.original: 地面に火薬を設置し、 遠方から導火線に着火して爆発させる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇／仕込み時間短縮 LV.６で攻撃ヒット数増加／爆風に風圧追加</COL>
message.translation: Places an explosive on the ground to be detonated from afar. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. Decreases charge time. LV.6: Increases number of hits. Adds wind pressure to the blast.</COL>

message.original: ダガーを高速回転させ、敵を巻き込み斬りつける <PADM>左スティック<KEYM>移動キー</KEYM>で任意方向に移動できる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇 LV.６で移動距離が延長／攻撃ヒット数増加</COL>
message.translation: Spin around in a flurry of dagger strikes, drawing enemies inward. <PADM>Left Control Stick<KEYM>Directional Keys</KEYM>to move about while attacking. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.６: Increases movement speed and the number of strikes.</COL>

message.original: シーカーロープを放って敵を捕らえ、反動を利用して 鋭いスライディング攻撃を繰り出す <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇 LV.６で移動距離が延長</COL>
message.translation: Fires the seeker rope at an enemy and reels the user in for a sharp sliding attack. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.６: Extends the range of movement.</COL>

message.original: 自身の体に炎をまとい触れた敵にダメージを与える さらに武器の攻撃属性を炎にする ただし、発動中は自身の体力が徐々に減少する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に炎属性威力の上昇／体力減少軽減 LV.６で最大持続時間が延長</COL>
message.translation: Sets the user's body ablaze, damaging any nearby enemies. Also applies fire attributes to weapon attacks. Gradually drains the user's stamina while active. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases fire damage and decreases stamina consumption. LV.６: Maximizes the effect's duration.</COL>
